content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'sink_mdmfadlssynap_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sink_mdmfadlssynap_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://sink@mdmfadlssynap.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE mdmf_Product (
	[SRC_ID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SRC_FILENAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[BATCH_DATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[ERROR_TYPE] nvarchar(4000),
	[SRC_COLNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[SRC_COLVALUE] nvarchar(4000),
	[ERROR_DESC] nvarchar(4000),
	[BATCH_ID] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Converted/ADLS/ADLSTest/Product/2022/05/23/22/Product_202205232201.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [sink_mdmfadlssynap_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.mdmf_Product
GO
